attributes.action: RETAIN THE RED ARROWS DISPLAY TEAM AT SCAMPTON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having been reassured that the Red  Arrows are not to be disbanded, the question of them remaining at RAF Scampton has not been addressed.
The Red Arrows Aeronautic Display team plays an increasing important role in economic develpment, tourism & the local economy of the West Lindsey and Lincoln areas.
The presence of the Red Arrows at Scampton provides over 130 civilian jobs in addition to the service personnel & their families.
Scampton is also famous as the base of 617 Squadron The Dam Busters and Guy Gibsons dog 'Nigger' remains interred on the base.
The base at Scampton was closed in the 1990s & only reopened in 2001, that closure did huge damage to the local economy.
Please support this petition

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SaveTheReds/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
